descriptionHtml:
Nathair sgiathach = Scottish Gaelic for Dragon

Adds a unique sword to Skyrim that has the same effect as Dragonbane without the visual effect. It's 2 points more base damage than Deadric. It can be found at Dragontooth Crater inside the tower on a table.

I didnt make a crafting recipe for it, Theres way too many recipes as is and finding what you want to make is a pain in the butt since Bethesda didnt allow us to make new categories and it is supposed to be unique. It can be tempered at any sharpening wheel with 1 steel ingot. It may be able to be enchanted further, I didnt add the no enchant keyword and didnt test that yet.

Skyrim SE version: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/7757/?] Nathair sgiathach [/url]

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Versions and update info:[/size][/color][/b]

V1.0 Initial release

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Compatibility and required files:[/size][/color][/b]

Requires: Skyrim.

Mod compatibilities, compatible with any mod except one that changes the same location.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Install:[/size][/color][/b]

Use NMM or the individual downloads or...

Manual for individual files:
1. Unzip/unrar to any location.
2. Copy contents into your Data folder.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Mod Use Permission: [/size][/color][/b]

Mod Authors: Feel free to use in your mod, retexture, whatever as long as you don't sell it. Requires credits.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]Credits: [/size][/color][/b]

Bethesda and me.

[b][color=#748229][size=5]My other mods....[/size][/color][/b]

[spoiler]
